about:
I'm a web developer living in Denver, Colorado, looking for local opportunities to build things for the web. Some of the larger projects I've worked on recently are listed in the menu; take a look and feel free to get in contact if you have any questions.

My skills are mostly centered around front-end development (HTML, CSS, Javascript), although I have extensive experience with PHP, SQL, and other server side technologies as well. In total I've been doing web development for about six years, and I've always enjoyed staying on top of modern technologies to build effective web and mobile applications.

In the past few months I've done a lot of work with VueJs, and more recently I've started getting into React. This porfolio site is built with VueJs and Sass, but I've also built a React version hosted on AWS as a learning exercise. I have several years of experience working with Angular (v1.x) as well. Look below for a list of some of the technologies I've worked with frequently, but feel free to call or email if you'd like more details, references, or code samples.

recommendations.name: Antonia S. New, M.D
recommendations.title:
Director of Medical Student Education in Psychiatry,
Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai
